skills.name: Prayer
desc: When Active, Aura Slowly Regenerates
The Life Of You And Your Party

skills.name: Cleansing
desc: When Active, Aura Reduces The Length
Of Time You and Your Party
Will Remain Poisoned or Cursed

skills.name: Meditation
desc: When Active, Aura Increases Mana Recovery
For You And Your Party

skills.name: Defiance
desc: When Active, Aura Increases The Defense
Of You And Your Party

skills.name: Vigor
desc: When Active, Aura Increases Stamina Recovery Rate
Maximum Stamina
And Movement Speed For You And Your Party

skills.name: Redemption
desc: When Active, Aura Attempts to Redeem
The Souls Of Slain Enemies To Give
You Life And Mana

skills.name: Resist Fire
desc: When Active, Aura Decreases Fire Damage
Done To You And Your Party

skills.name: Resist Cold
desc: When Active, Aura Decreases Cold Damage
Done To You And Your Party

skills.name: Resist Lightning
desc: When Active, Aura Decreases Lightning Damage
Done To You And Your Party

skills.name: Salvation
desc: When Active, Aura Decreases Fire, Cold And Lightning
Damage
Done To You And Your Party

skills.name: Might
desc: When Active, Aura Increases The Damage
Done By You And Your Party

skills.name: Blessed Aim
desc: When Active, Aura Increases The Attack Rating
For You and Your Party

skills.name: Concentration
desc: When Active, Aura Increases The Damage And
Decreases The Chance
That The Attack Will Be Interrupted For You And
Your Party

skills.name: Fanaticism
desc: When Active, Aura Increases Damage, Attack Speed
And Attack Rating For You And Your Party

skills.name: Holy Fire
desc: When Active, Aura Damages Nearby Enemies
With Heavenly Flames
Adds Fire Damage To Your Attack

skills.name: Holy Freeze
desc: When Active, Aura Freezes Nearby Monsters
Adds Cold Damage To Your Attack

skills.name: Holy Shock
desc: When Active, Aura Causes Pulses Of Electricity
To Damage Nearby Enemies
Adds Lightning Damage To Your Attack

skills.name: Thorns
desc: When Active, Reflects Damage Done To You
Back At Your Attacker

skills.name: Sanctuary
desc: When Active, Aura Damages The Undead
And Knocks Them Back

skills.name: Conviction
desc: When Active, Aura Reduces The Defenses
And Resistances Of Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Sacrifice
desc: Increased Accuracy And Damage
At The Cost Of Life

skills.name: Zeal
desc: Allows You To Attack Multiple Adjacent Enemies
With A Single Attack

skills.name: Vengeance
desc: Fire, Lightning And Cold Damage Are Added
To Each Successful Attack

skills.name: Conversion
desc: Converts Monsters To Fight Against
Other Foul Demons And Beasts

skills.name: Holy Bolt
desc: A Bolt Of Divine Energy
That Damages Undead Enemies

skills.name: Blessed Hammer
desc: Summons An Ethereal Hammer That
Spirals Outwards Damaging Enemies It Hits

skills.name: Fist Of The Heavens
desc: Lightning Strikes Your Target As Holy Bolts
Seek Out Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Smite
desc: Temporarily Stun Your Enemy
By Bashing It With Your Shield

skills.name: Charge
desc: Charge Into Battle And Attack An Enemy

skills.name: Holy Shield
desc: When Active, Aura Decreases Fire, Cold And Lightning
Damage
Done To You And Your Party
